name: Space Junk (itch) (CPGAMES)
description:
Debris from space missions, including intentionally ejected junk,  parts from satellites, loose bolts and paint are all  to be found floating in a cloud around the earth.

Space tourism has contributed to the junk cloud significantly during its brief popular period.

This belt of debris is orbiting the earth, becoming more concentrated and posing a growing risk to space craft and satellites.

This junk contains many useful resources that must be recycled extra terrestrially to reduce cost and prevent introduction of pollutants into earths atmosphere.

-Protect the Command station from Space Junk.

-Research and Create Tech to assist Junk Collection

-Process Junk with Recycle Station to Collect resources and expand the Space Station

Once the station is established a crew of astronauts will be dispatched from earth, allowing for more complex operations. This crew will require an eco system to survive and work within the inhospitable vacuum of space. Collect elements and minerals from space rocks to create: soil, water, fertilisers, build a flora house to grow food plants to sustain the crew, and provide a source of oxygen. Upgrade your recycling facilities to produce bio-batteries, process organic waste in return for electricity.

This operation must not leave any new junk in space. The system must be stable and self sustaining.
